author: sussman
msg: Make 'svn switch' require a --force flag, since disjoint urls will
currently break commits and updates.
* main.c (svn_cl__cmd_table): allow 'switch' to take --force option.
Take -n option too, as it should have been doing earlier.
* switch-cmd.c (svn_cl__switch): require the --force flag to do a switch.

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix bad URL.

author: cmpilato
msg: * subversion/tests/libsvn_delta/delta-combine-test.c
New test program for verifying delta combination.  There is no delta
combining code right now, and even if there was, it might not have
an interface that would plug into this test program.  So what.  If
that happens, we'll just delete this file from the repository and go
about writing another test.  Just don't want to lose this work in
case it can be used later.
* build.conf
Added section for delta-combine-test (a new test that is NOT run as
part of `make check' yet).

author: cmpilato
msg: * INSTALL:
Added information to the build requirements about optional libraries
used by our dependents that can add functionality to Subversion.
Factored the same information out of the windows-specific section
since it is broadly applicable. Also cleaned up a couple of glitches
in text elsewhere.  Patch by Bruce Atherton <bruce@callenish.com>.

author: sussman
msg: Make 'svn --version' print "version 0.9.0 (rc1)".
Let's roll our first tarball from this revision.
* svn_version.h (SVN_VER_MINOR): set to 9.
(SVN_VER_TAG): set to "rc1" (release candidate 1)
